title: Server Lag?
body: So, I was playing with my friends and everything was normal, when suddenly my ping spiked from normal (about 30-50) to about like, 300+. It made the game basically unplayable, with all commands taking way too long to actually go through, and I tried everything; restarted my computer, modem, etc. I know it's only League of Legends because after restarting everything, Dad downloaded a gig of data in a couple of minutes, and I loaded up youtube to test it out and it works fine, but then I went into a custom game to test it out and the ping was worse-500-900 ping. Is anybody else experiencing this? Does anybody have any clue how I can fix this? It's seriously ridiculous and incredibly frustrating, because it literally stops me from playing.

replies.body:
yeah.. my ping was 40ms before server move to east. then it was 70ms after server moved. Now its at 180ms every single game.

NOT GOING TO SPENT A DIME or RANKED.
I'm fixing this, but i reckon we're the only two, i have no fixes though :/
